markdown:
The bottlenose dolphin is the most common and widespread species of dolphin. They are social predators who hunt shallow seas and rivers in large family groups called pods. Sailors are fond of bottlenose dolphins and frequently tell of how they've saved drowning mariners or protected crew from sharks with blows from their powerful snouts. **[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 14 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9 [Bottlenose Dolphin](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2926) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 103 1.1 **Perception** +7; aquatic echolocation 120 feet, [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69) **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6 **Str** +2 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** -4 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 **Aquatic Echolocation** A bottlenose dolphin can use its hearing as a [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) sense at the listed range, but only underwater.
**Deep Breath** A bottlenose dolphin can [hold its breath](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) for 2 hours. --- **AC** 15 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +7 **Will** +5 **HP** 16 --- **Speed** swim 60 feet **Melee** snout +6, **Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning **Melee** jaws +6, **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing **Ramming Speed** The bottlenose dolphin Swims twice and then makes a snout Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. A Large or smaller creature hit by this attack must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or be [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) for 1 round.
name: Bottlenose Dolphin

text: Bottlenose Dolphin The bottlenose dolphin is the most common and widespread species of dolphin. They are social predators who hunt shallow seas and rivers in large family groups called pods. Sailors are fond of bottlenose dolphins and frequently tell of how they've saved drowning mariners or protected crew from sharks with blows from their powerful snouts. Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 14 Unspecific Lore : DC 12 Specific Lore : DC 9 Bottlenose Dolphin Source Monster Core pg. 103 1.1 Perception +7; aquatic echolocation 120 feet, low-light vision Languages Skills Athletics +6 Str +2 Dex +3 Con +2 Int -4 Wis +3 Cha +0 Aquatic Echolocation A bottlenose dolphin can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range, but only underwater. Deep Breath A bottlenose dolphin can hold its breath for 2 hours. --- AC 15 Fort +6 Ref +7 Will +5 HP 16 --- Speed swim 60 feet Melee Single Action snout +6, Damage 1d6+2 bludgeoning Melee Single Action jaws +6, Damage 1d6+2 piercing Ramming Speed Two Actions The bottlenose dolphin Swims twice and then makes a snout Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. A Large or smaller creature hit by this attack must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or be slowed 1 for 1 round.
